title: Democracy Women's Ab Solution Itty Bitty Boot
description: Democracy’s signature “Ab”solution jean uses innovative construction that incorporates super-stretch denim, slimming panels, a hidden inner elastic waistband and mesh panels
Pockets strategically placed for a figure flattering shape and a sweetheart back yoke to "boost your assets"
The Classic Itty Bitty Boot made with soft, premium fabrics
Great for all body shapes. We recommend ordering one size down for your most "flatter"ing it.
Available in short and long inseams as well as Petite and Plus sizing
Inseam lengths: Regular 32”, Short 29”, Long 34”. Product tags indicate inseam length at end of style #

Built from the bottoms up, Democracy blends a universal fit for all shapes and sizes with an effortless aesthetic. Inspired by this multitasking woman with an ageless mindset, Democracy introduces emerging trends in an accessible and affordable way that meets all of her lifestyle needs. Through unparalleled value that fits her body and her wallet. Democracy embraces who she is, enhances what she’s got, elevates her confidence, and evolves her personal style.
